short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write tweets and replies for social media (twitter/x, linkedin) with a click using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Craft meaningful responses 10 times faster with just one click using AI for Twitter & LinkedIn for Free!

PostMasterAI is a free extension designed to swiftly scaffold meaningful replies for X (Twitter) and LinkedIn.

Steps:
📥 Download the Extension.
🔓 Open the extension and paste your OpenAI API Key. (Get your OpenAI Key from openai.com)
🧙‍♂️ Press the Orange Wand Icon to generate.

Boost your X (Twitter) and LinkedIn following 📈 with AI-driven replies! 🤖💬

Note: 
1. PostMasterAI utilizes OpenAI to generate replies. OpenAI is a paid service, so please ensure you have credits in your account.
2. Your OpenAI API Key is stored solely on your browser. PostMasterAI does not expose it anywhere.
3. Calls to generate replies are made directly to OpenAI from your browser.
4. You can substitute OpenAI with any other service that supports the OpenAI SDK, such as deepseek.com.
